search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Phone.com (phone-com.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Phone.com can be found at: https://www.phone.com/pricing.

extracted_content.content:

Phone.com and its third-party providers use Cookies and other similar technologies to enhance user experience, help the website or application to function, analyze traffic and performance, for advertising purposes, and may be shared with third parties, such as our social media, advertising, or analytics partners, as described in our Privacy Statement. Click Cookie Settings below to manage your preferences. Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Are there different business phone system prices?

Yes. Phone.com gives you multiple options to fit your precise business needs, so you only pay for what you need, when you need it. We also offer [add-on premium features](https://www.phone.com/premium-features/) for more advanced phone services. Business phone system pricing plans start at just $18 per month per user for the Basic plan. Want to save even more? Choose to be billed annually instead of monthly and save 17%.

What is the definition of a “User?”

A user is anyone who can make or receive business calls using Phone.com. In most organizations, each employee who makes or receives calls will be a user. Good news! Adding more users might reduce your per-user rate.

How many users do I need?

Phone.com allows you to pick the right plan for each user, so you pay for only what you need. For example, if you are the business owner, you might want to be a Pro user to take advantage of features like call recording and video meeting transcription. However, the basic user option might be sufficient for people who work in the field and take fewer calls.

Is there a discount for multiple users?

Volume discounts are available, [contact sales](https://www.phone.com/contact-sales/) for more information.

Can I change my plan or add users after I sign up?

Yes. Once you have set up your account, you can add, change, or remove users.

What are “pooled” minutes?

Each basic user in your account will add 500 minutes to be used by any basic user in your account for inbound or outbound calling. For example, if you have 3 basic users in your account, 1,500 minutes will be available for use by any of those users. This applies only to basic users. All plus and pro users will have unlimited minutes.

What happens if I exceed the minute or text segment limits on my plan?

Basic users who use more than 500 minutes of inbound or outbound calling in one month will be charged $0.039 per minute for each additional minute.

What taxes and fees are added to my bill?

Like others in the industry, Phone.com must bill customers under the laws and regulations set in place by tax authorities and regulatory agencies, including federal, state, and local regulators. These jurisdictions and agencies assess taxes, fees, and surcharges for telecommunications-related services and programs that solution providers, including Phone.com, are obligated to collect from customers and remit to these agencies. There are also some surcharges that telephone-related services providers are permitted, but not required to pass through to customers.

Taxes and fees that impact the telecommunications industry are frequently adjusted, based on your location, and subject to change without notice. If new or different taxes, surcharges, or fees are imposed on Phone.com, we will include those adjustments in applicable billings.

Detailed information is available on the [Federal Communications Commission (FCC) website](https://www.fcc.gov/).

Am I signing up for a contract?

You have a choice in pricing options with Phone.com. Depending on your business needs, you can choose between our month-to-month or annual payment options. Save by paying annually, or reserve the flexibility to cancel at any time by selecting month-to-month payments.

What is included with Business Text Messages (SMS)?

Phone.com’s solution allows you to send and receive text and image messages using your business phone number. The US wireless carriers have implemented registration requirements, limitations and fees for outbound text messages to their customers. Customers that wish to use Phone.com for text messaging will need to register and accept these additional fees.  [Learn more](https://support.phone.com/what-are-the-outbound-text-messaging-limitations-and-registration-requirements).  Phone.com’s service is intended for conversational text messaging.  Bulk or high volume SMS is available at an additional cost.

Important Details and Disclaimers
---------------------------------

1.  Applicable federal and state taxes and fees will be added to your monthly invoice.Pooled and unlimited plans include calls to the United States and many area codes in Canada. Click here for international rates.
    
2.  The 30-day money-back guarantee applies to user fees only. Premium phone numbers and hardware are excluded.
3.  The US wireless carriers have implemented registration requirements and fees for outbound text messages to their customers. Customers that wish to use Phone.com for text messaging will need to register and accept these additional fees. Learn more.

4.  All plans are subject to fair use restrictions on voice, text, and video. For more information refer to the Terms of Service. Business SMS is limited to Person-to-Person SMS, only. Application-to-Person SMS is available at an additional cost.
5.  In order to protect against international dialing fraud, international calling must be enabled for your account by our support team. In some cases, a $200 deposit may be required before international dialing is enabled.
